Posts.Content: hi di - i am double your age but you still feel the same. family and friends mean well and you know they care but sometimes you just want to shut yourself away. i have one good friend that seems to understand this and sends me a text everyday so that i can say as much or as little as i want  also i know i can pick up the phone and she would be there asap xxx
Posts.Title: Bit of a Shock!

Posts.Content: hi guys had 10 lymph nodes removed on 9th oct still in terrible pain also had drain so it is not fluid trying hard to do exercises start chemo today
Posts.Title: Pain after lumpectomy & lymph node clearance

Posts.Content: i also spoke to my breast care nurse yesterday and was given the same advice. take inflamatories,use ibuleve gel and persevere with excercise.i can still only lift my arm to shoulder level so my left arm is doing all the work as well as being the one that has flu jabs ,blood tests chemo etc.   xxxx
Posts.Title: Pain after lumpectomy & lymph node clearance

Posts.Content: i also had grade 3 tumour in2007 but had chemo and radio butthey were concerned about my nodes . now going through chemo for a 2nd time because lymph nodes are infected. iam glad  you have had axilleray clearance as this should have worked they couldn't do mne first time around because of scar tissue. i had 10 nodes removed but good news it had not spread anywhere else    xxx
Posts.Title: second breast opp and axillery clearance

Posts.Content: Good luck for next week . In the meantime keep us posted.
Posts.Title: second breast opp and axillery clearance
